TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 、 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针位于控件上方并且用户按下鼠标按钮时发生 事件。The event occurs when the user presses the mouse button while the pointer is over a control. 当指针停留在控件上并且用户释放鼠标按钮时，会发生 事件。The event occurs when the user releases the mouse button while the pointer remains over the control. 当用户将鼠标指针移到控件上时发生 事件。The event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over a control. 指定按下鼠标按钮的时间、按下并释放鼠标按钮的次数、鼠标的坐标和鼠标滚轮移动的量。A specifies which mouse button is pressed, how many times the mouse button was pressed and released, the coordinates of the mouse, and the amount the mouse wheel moved. 如果用户在释放鼠标按钮之前将焦点切换到另一个应用程序，则可以在没有相应 的情况下接收 事件。It is possible to receive a event without a corresponding , if the user switches focus to another application before releasing the mouse button. 、和 类存在这三个事件。These three events exist for the , , and classes. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理 控件上的 事件，以便单击鼠标右键以选择控件中的所有文本。The following code examples handles the event on a control so that clicking the right mouse button selects all the text in the control. 此示例要求您具有一个包含名为 `textBox1`的 控件的窗体。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control that is named `textBox1`. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用 `Location` 属性跟踪鼠标左键的单击，并绘制一系列直线段以响应用户输入。The following code example uses the `Location` property to track clicks of the left mouse button and to draw a series of straight line segments in response to user input. 如果隐藏了窗体，然后重新显示，则该示例不会重绘行;为了简单起见，省略了此代码。The example does not redraw the lines if you hide the form and then redisplay it; this code has been omitted for simplicity. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例使用 和 属性将鼠标指针的当前位置显示在 窗口中。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管 Windows 界面将标准鼠标事件定义为单击或双击，但单个应用程序可以将更多的点击次数解释为单个事件。Although the Windows interface defines standard mouse events as either single-clicks or double-clicks, individual applications can interpret a larger number of clicks as a single event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解何时发生事件，并可帮助您进行调试。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `Control1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#54)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#54)]

summary.span: 获取鼠标轮已转动的制动器数的有符号计数乘以 WHEEL_DELTA 常数。

span.span: Gets a signed count of the number of detents the mouse wheel has rotated, multiplied by the WHEEL_DELTA constant.

summary.span: 制动器是鼠标轮的一个凹口。

span.span: A detent is one notch of the mouse wheel.

value.span: 鼠标轮已转动的制动器数的有符号计数乘以 WHEEL_DELTA 常数。

span.span: A signed count of the number of detents the mouse wheel has rotated, multiplied by the WHEEL_DELTA constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标滚轮组合了滑轮和鼠标按钮的功能。The mouse wheel combines the features of a wheel and a mouse button. 滑轮具有离散的均匀的凹槽。The wheel has discrete, evenly spaced notches. 旋转滚轮时，将在遇到每个齿格时发送一条滑轮消息。When you rotate the wheel, a wheel message is sent as each notch is encountered. 制动器是由 windows 常量 WHEEL_DELTA 定义的一个色轮凹槽，即120。One wheel notch, a detent, is defined by the windows constant WHEEL_DELTA, which is 120. 正值表示滚轮旋转（远离用户）;负值表示滚轮向后旋转（朝向用户）。A positive value indicates that the wheel was rotated forward (away from the user); a negative value indicates that the wheel was rotated backward (toward the user). 目前，120的值是一制动器的标准。Currently, a value of 120 is the standard for one detent. 如果引入了更高的分辨率鼠标，WHEEL_DELTA 的定义可能会变得更小。If higher resolution mice are introduced, the definition of WHEEL_DELTA might become smaller. 大多数应用程序应检查正值或负值而不是聚合总计。Most applications should check for a positive or negative value rather than an aggregate total. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解何时发生事件，并可帮助您进行调试。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含继承自 的类型的实例，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后，将该实例命名为 `Control1` 并确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#54)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#54)]

summary.span: 获取鼠标在产生鼠标事件时的位置。

span.span: Gets the location of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含鼠标相对于窗体左上角的 x 坐标和 y 坐标（以像素为单位）。

span.span: A that contains the x- and y- mouse coordinates, in pixels, relative to the upper-left corner of the form.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性来跟踪鼠标左键单击并绘制一系列直线段来响应用户输入。The following code example uses the property to track left mouse clicks and draw a series of straight line segments in response to user input. 如果隐藏了窗体，然后重新显示，则该示例不会保留绘制的行;省略此代码的目的是为了简单起见。The example does not persist the drawn lines if you hide the form and then redisplay it; this code was omitted for simplicity. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

span.span: Windows Forms Coordinates

related.span: Windows 窗体中的鼠标事件

span.span: Mouse Events in Windows Forms

summary.span: 获取鼠标在产生鼠标事件时的 x 坐标。

span.span: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: 鼠标的 X 坐标（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标坐标根据所引发的事件而有所不同。The mouse coordinates vary based on the event being raised. 例如，当处理 事件时，鼠标坐标值相对于引发事件的控件的坐标。For example, when the event is handled, the mouse coordinate values are relative to the coordinates of the control that raised the event. 与拖放操作相关的一些事件具有相对于窗体原点或屏幕原点的关联鼠标坐标值。Some events related to drag-and-drop operations have associated mouse-coordinate values that are relative to the form origin or the screen origin. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 和 属性将鼠标指针的当前位置显示在 窗口中。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

span.span: Gets the y-coordinate of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: 鼠标的 Y 坐标（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标坐标根据所引发的事件而有所不同。The mouse coordinates vary based on the event being raised. 例如，当处理 事件时，鼠标坐标值相对于引发事件的控件的坐标。For example, when the event is handled, the mouse coordinate values are relative to the coordinates of the control that raised the event. 与拖放操作相关的某些事件具有与窗体原点或屏幕原点相关的鼠标坐标值。Some events related to drag-and-drop operations have associated mouse coordinate values that are relative to the form origin or the screen origin. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 和 属性将鼠标指针的当前位置显示在 窗口中。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. 若要使用此代码，请从窗体构造函数调用 `TrackCoordinates`。To use this code, call `TrackCoordinates` from the form constructor. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]
